medical_history.chief_complaint: 3 days of abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began diffusely and then localized to the RLQ over the course of 3 days. The patient also reported intermittent nausea, chills, bloating, loss of appetite, and low-grade fevers. There was no emesis or diarrhea reported.
